Author: Gordon Komodo#7477
Content:
@cryptopoli 1. a special transaction will be send to your compromised address. it will be for a fraction of a KMD
2. you need to send all the dust amount from the compromised address to the destination address you specified
3. IF and only IF, your address has no disputes, or contradictory claim info, and the proper destination address receives the special payment, a refund tx will be made. PLEASE do not ask when these refund tx will be made,Jl777 is working as fast as  he can, so it will happen when it happens.

what do you need to do?
if your claim amount matches the current batches size range check to see if you got the special transaction. Then make sure you only send it to the address you claimed. after that, just wait. Jl777 will announce status of each batch.

if you didnt get a special tx, that means your address is under dispute or you filed too many claims or it is the wrong size. PLEASE wait until we process all the problem free cases first. They will be done AFTER the easy cases are done.

Author: bemmmie#5891
Content:
hi, unfortunately I have not received any refund yet. My mistake was, that I filled in the form twice wrongly and only the third time with the correct payout address

1.) without TXID
2.) I did not create the new address with verus agama wallet
3.) the third form is actually the correct one, here I used the Agama Windows v0.6.0-13-PBaas-cross-chain-tech-preview

I sent the small amount I received from the KMD team from my compromised address to the mailing address of the third form. I hope you can help me and apologize for my stupidity.
